plants.name: Rose
plants.care_instructions: Requires full sun. Water regularly, especially during dry periods.
plants.description: Roses are a symbol of love and passion. They come in various colors and sizes.

plants.name: Sunflower
plants.care_instructions: Needs full sun. Water when the soil is dry.
plants.description: Sunflowers are known for their large, vibrant blooms that follow the sun.

plants.name: Tulip
plants.care_instructions: Plant in well-drained soil. Water sparingly during winter.
plants.description: Tulips are popular spring flowers that come in many colors and shapes.

plants.name: Orchid
plants.care_instructions: Needs indirect light. Keep the soil moist but not waterlogged.
plants.description: Orchids are exotic flowers with intricate patterns and a wide range of colors.

plants.name: Lily
plants.care_instructions: Requires full sun or partial shade. Keep the soil consistently moist.
plants.description: Lilies are elegant flowers that come in a variety of colors and sizes.

plants.name: Daisy
plants.care_instructions: Prefers full sun. Water when the soil is dry.
plants.description: Daisies are cheerful flowers with a classic, simple look.

plants.name: Violet
plants.care_instructions: Grows well in partial shade. Keep soil moist but well-drained.
plants.description: Violets are small, delicate flowers known for their vibrant colors.

plants.name: Iris
plants.origin: Europe, North Africa, and Western Asia
plants.care_instructions: Needs full sun. Water when the soil is dry.
plants.description: Irises have unique, intricate flowers and come in many shades.

plants.name: Cactus
plants.care_instructions: Requires full sun. Water sparingly.
plants.description: Cacti are succulent plants adapted to arid environments, known for their spines and unique shapes.

plants.name: Fern
plants.care_instructions: Prefers indirect light and high humidity. Keep soil moist.
plants.description: Ferns are ancient plants with feathery, green leaves that thrive in shaded, moist environments.

plants.name: Basil
plants.care_instructions: Needs full sun. Water regularly but avoid waterlogging.
plants.description: Basil is a fragrant herb commonly used in cooking, particularly in Italian cuisine.

plants.name: Mint
plants.care_instructions: Thrives in full sun or partial shade. Keep soil moist.
plants.description: Mint is a versatile herb known for its refreshing flavor and aroma.

plants.name: Lavender
plants.care_instructions: Requires full sun and well-drained soil. Water sparingly.
plants.description: Lavender is valued for its fragrant flowers and essential oils used in aromatherapy.

plants.name: Aloe Vera
plants.care_instructions: Needs bright, indirect light. Water sparingly.
plants.description: Aloe Vera is known for its medicinal properties and soothing gel found in its leaves.

plants.name: Spider Plant
plants.care_instructions: Prefers bright, indirect light. Keep soil moist but not waterlogged.
plants.description: Spider plants are popular houseplants known for their air-purifying qualities and arching leaves.

plants.name: Pothos
plants.care_instructions: Thrives in low light. Water when the top inch of soil is dry.
plants.description: Pothos is a low-maintenance plant with trailing vines and heart-shaped leaves, ideal for indoor spaces.

plants.name: ZZ Plant
plants.care_instructions: Tolerates low light. Water infrequently.
plants.description: ZZ Plants are known for their glossy, dark green leaves and tolerance of low light and drought.

plants.name: Chinese Evergreen
plants.care_instructions: Prefers low to medium light. Keep soil moist but not soggy.
plants.description: Chinese Evergreens are hardy plants with attractive foliage and ease of care.

plants.name: Peace Lily
plants.care_instructions: Thrives in low to medium light. Keep soil consistently moist.
plants.description: Peace Lilies are elegant houseplants known for their white blooms and air-purifying properties.

plants.name: Bamboo Palm
plants.care_instructions: Prefers indirect light. Keep soil moist.
plants.description: Bamboo Palms add a tropical feel to indoor spaces and are excellent at removing indoor pollutants.

plants.name: Geranium
plants.care_instructions: Needs full sun. Water when the soil is dry.
plants.description: Geraniums are popular for their colorful flowers and are commonly grown in containers and gardens.

plants.name: Begonia
plants.care_instructions: Prefers indirect light. Keep soil moist.
plants.description: Begonias are known for their decorative foliage and vibrant flowers.
